DOC.detailed_description: In study , investigator choose male female subject age 35 79 year old mild moderate essential hypertension . At first 2 week , patient use felodipine 5mg daily . If blood pressure dose n't meet target ( 140/90mmHg ) , randomize metoprolol , lisinopril hydrochlorothiazide combination group another 4 week therapy . After , blood pressure still meet target , up-titrate felodipine 10mg , follow 4 week therapy . And blood pressure still meet target , up-titrate combine drug maximum dosage . The whole treatment duration 14 week . The primary outcome evaluate percentage subject reach blood pressure target ( defined < 140 / 90 mmHg ) 14 week treatment felodipine sustain release combination metoprolol , lisinopril hydrochlorothiazide .
